column4: you may also want to try searching "c interpreter", if I'm thinkig that's what you want,.
are you looking for something that doesn't compile?
in old Visual Stuios we would hit F5 to "build & run"
that compiles, so you are looking for an IDE
IDE then, there is kdevelop and eclipse.
yeah, but i'm not finding a lot in the way of ide's right now
use eclipse, then, it has that kind of function.
i've been told eclipse is terrible with C, any truth to that?
I think it's fine, I'm using it for java and C
like in all IDE's you need to direct where you compiler is, that's all.
if you install kdevelop, that has a c/C++ ide
it's open source ;) and i just checked, kdevelop also has that function you want.
so go to synaptic and search kdevelop and eclipse and ddd, install them all! and see which one you like best.
lol, but it's powerful, it can be used for different languages,
aye, that's what i'm noticing. impressive for sure
